author: Matías Peredo
description: Matías’ inspiration: “The ‘flip’ is a very old cocktail category, with egg as the base ingredient, finished with grated nutmeg. The name for my cocktail stems from Jerry Thomas’s book ‘How to Mix Drinks;’ which was published in 1862 and contained the first ‘flip’ style cocktail. This was also the year that BACARDÍ rum was born.By revising this classic drink for a modern palette with BACARDÍ Reserve Ocho, my cocktail 1862 celebrates this happy coincidence.”
name: 1862 Flip

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
